explains: vt. 重建；恢复；重新安置

sentences.en: He claims that imperialists are trying to re-establish colonial rule in the country.
sentences.cn: 他声称帝国主义者正试图在该国重建殖民统治。

sentences.en: The royalties enabled the inventor to re-establish himself in business.
sentences.cn: 这些使用费使这名发明者能再次立足商界。

sentences.en: Re-establish contact with extended family members.
sentences.cn: 与众多亲人重新建立联系。
